channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Destined to fail': 5-year-old's murder exposes cracks in Florida child protection system
Russia's Aeroflot suffers IT failure, hackers claim responsibility
Ancient site stirs heated political debate on India's past
Ethiopians tackle food prices with small-scale poultry farms
Elon Musk responds to videos of fight in downtown Cincinnati
WATCH: Passengers exit plane via emergency slide after aborted takeoff
item.description: Passengers evacuated onto the runway via emergency slide after an American Airlines flight aborted its takeoff on the runway in Denver on Saturday.

item.title: Russia hits Ukraine with hundreds of drones and missiles prompting NATO response
item.description: Polish and Swedish military aircraft were scrambled in response to a large Russian drone and missile attack launched across Ukraine on Sunday night.

item.title: WATCH: Soccer coach who says he was deported over tattoo celebrates release from detention
item.description: A soccer coach who says he was mistakenly deported from the U.S. to El Salvador's CECOT mega-prison because of a tattoo celebrated his release from de...

item.title: Thai, Cambodian leaders agree on ceasefire to end deadly border clashes
item.description: Thai and Cambodian leaders are meeting in Malaysia in an urgent effort to resolve deadly border clashes that entered a fifth day despite mounting inte...

item.title: 3-year-old dies in hot car while in custody of Alabama state contract worker: Police
item.description: Katerrius Sparks, 3, from Bessemer, Alabama, died on July 22, police and the county coroner said.

item.title: srael says it's begun daily pauses in fighting in parts of Gaza to let aid in
item.description: The local pause in fighting came days after ceasefire efforts between Israel and Hamas appeared to be in doubt.

item.title: Monterey County plane crash kills all 3 on board
item.description: Just before 11 p.m. Saturday, the Coast Guard Station in Monterey was alerted to a twin-engine Beechcraft that had crashed between 200-300 yards off P...

item.title: Trump administration seeks to end safeguards for immigrant kids
item.description: The Justice Department seeks to terminate the Flores Settlement Agreement, which requires U.S. immigration officials to hold migrant children in facil...

item.title: 7/27: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Suspect in Michigan stabbing rampage to face terrorism charges; A rare look at Old Joliet Prison

item.title: 14 people die from malnutrition in Gaza, health ministry says
item.description: The Hamas-run Ministry of Health in the Gaza Strip said in a Monday statement that another 14 people died of malnutrition over the previous 24 hours.

item.title: It’s a year of rapid change, except when it comes to Trump’s approval numbers, AP-NORC polling finds
Trump’s demand for Washington NFL team name change ignores years of psychological data, experts say
Suspect in Walmart knife attack expected to face terrorism and assault charges
item.description: Authorities say they plan to file terrorism and assault with intent to murder charges against the suspect in a weekend knife attack at a Walmart store...
